title: Massive 38-inch Monitor = Mind Blown!
description: (   ) --- Today's Mystery Video -  LG Ultrawide Monitors (USA Link) -  LG Ultrawide Monitors (International) -   LG is giving away 15 of these monitors and a grand price of a $10,000 computer setup. Full details can be found here -   The monitor featured in this video is the new 38UC99. It's a 38-inch ultrawide monitor from LG featuring a resolution of 3840 x 1600. This is the biggest ultrawide monitor I've ever featured and certainly a beauty to look at!  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
